title: Let’s Be Bison | Guests: Steve Deace & Justin Haskins | 11/4/21
description:
President Biden and the Democrats have failed to learn after Election Day 2021’s red wave. Winsome Sears is a rock star. Has QAnon been taken over by pranksters? Glenn reviews the latest conspiracy theory involving the return of JFK. A trucker in New Jersey proves Americans trust their neighbors more than “elites.” Glenn reviews the lessons Democrats should have learned and argues conservatives should take inspiration from bison. Biden’s vaccine mandate is around the corner, so Glenn and Stu review it. BlazeTV’s Steve Deace breaks down Virginia’s election and what Dr. Fauci has become. “The Great Reset” co-author Justin Haskins joins to break down Biden’s new partnership with the World Economic Forum.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
